name: LoungeflyZootopia: Chibi Group Zip Around Portemonnee - Merchoid Nederland
description: If you're looking for a wallet that packs a punch, we've got just the thing for you. Say hello to the Disney Zootopia Zip Around Wallet, featuring none other than our favourite mammal heroes from the city of Zootopia. And let's be honest, who wouldn't want Officer Judy Hopps guarding their hard-earned cash? Let's start with the design - the wallet showcases the Zootopia cityscape and our furry friends Nick Wilde, Officer Clawhauser, Mayor Lionheart, and more. We promise the character illustrations will make you feel like you're right in the midst of the action. The wallet is made of vegan leather (polyurethane), so you can feel good about carrying it around knowing it's cruelty-free. Bonus points to you for being kind to animals!But what really sets this wallet apart is its durability. With a sturdy metal hardware and zipped closure, it will keep your items safe and stylish for years. We know how important it is to feel secure in this day and age, so why not do it in style? The wallet is an officially licensed Disney product, so you know it's the real deal. Don't accept any imitations, folks.Now let's talk about the technical specs. The wallet measures 8 inches in width and 4 inches in height. Be aware that the width is measured across the bottom of the wallet, which we know can get a little confusing. Trust us, we've all been there. And have we mentioned the coordinating design of the inside lining fabric? It's definitely a nice touch that makes us smile every time we open it up.We could go on and on about this wallet, but we'll let the product speak for itself. And in the wise words of Officer Judy Hopps, "In Zootopia, anyone can be anything!" So go ahead and be your badass self, but do it in style with the Disney Zootopia Zip Around Wallet.Product DetailsProduct type: WalletLicense: ZootopiaManufacturer: LoungeflySpecificaties Gewicht: Ongeveer 150 gram (5 ounces) Land van herkomst: China Materialen: Kunstleer (polyurethaan) SKU: WDWA1604GTIN: 671803367517
